text: @KagutaMuseveni Thanks Mr President for that tireless work u are doing to help ugandans not to get infected with @Covid19 , but we appeal to you, to help us on these Landlords n loan officers yet we are not working at all, Just like you helped us in other days, help us on this Mr. President!
